articles.title: Angel Tax on multinational companies may bedevil FDI - The Economic Times
articles.description: The government provided a blanket exemption from angel tax to various structures such as pension and sovereign wealth funds, among others investing in India from 21 countries, but corporate entities were left out, making them potentially liable to the levy.
